title: Land of the Giants: The Facebook Election
summary:
Today, we're sharing a special episode from Land of the Giants: The Facebook/ Meta Disruption. To listen to the full series from episode one, Follow Land of the Giants to get new episodes every Wednesday.
https://podcasts.voxmedia.com/show/land-of-the-giants
Facebook used to brag about how its tools helped politicians swing elections. Now, the platformâ€™s relationship to politics is much more complicated. Today: the story of how one politician, again and again, forced Zuckerberg to confront his own role in democracy.
